title: Baseline Fonts
content:
Baseline Fonts Design & Type Co. is based in Wichita, Kansas and offers a wide range of typographic work including historic handwriting, letterpress and woodtype fonts. Fonts are available through the Baseline Fonts website and select vendors.

[http://www.baselinefonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001503/http:/www.baselinefonts.com/ "http://www.baselinefonts.com")

[Baseline Fonts News](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Baseline%20Fonts%20News)  
 [Baseline Fonts News - September 28, 2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205001503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Baseline%20Fonts%20News%20-%20September%2028%2C%202005)
author: nathan
